example.eg: The supermarket opening on a Sunday is an exception, because the next two days are public holidays; it doesn't normally do that.
example.egtrans: 超市周天营业是个例外情况，因为后两天就是公共假期。一般周天是关门的。

example.eg: Normally, students weren't allowed to take days off during term, but the school made an exception for Tim to go to his mum's wedding.
example.egtrans: 一般在学期中，学生是不允许请假的，但学校为蒂姆破例，准他去参加自己母亲的婚礼。

example.eg: I don't normally stay up after 10pm, but I'll make an exception, as it's your birthday.
We don't usually allow students to take holidays during term, but we'll make an exception for your daughter, as she's such a good student.
I take exception to that comment.
You must arrive on time for this job every day without exception.
